A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a life long Star Wars fan I was unbelievably disappointed by a movie that felt completely removed by the previous film (force awakens) and basically set out to change everything we new about the the franchise\, in most movies I would be fine with that\, but not Star Wars\, I love Star Wars for what it is not for being Disney-ifed with bad subversion and constant jokes\, I love Star Wars for the amazing characters and world both of witch were trashed beyond recognition for me in this movie...
